title: Annual cost of obesity £400 per taxpayer; NEWS BRIEFING ; NEWS
body:
Britain's obesity crisis is costing every taxpayer more than £400 a year, international research shows. Experts said 
the study of 52 countries by the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development was an "alarm call" 
about the scale of the damage caused by bulging waistlines. Conditions fuelled by excess weight are soaking up 
more than 8 per cent of health expenditure in the UK while cutting life expectancy by 2.7 years on average.
